message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great opportunity to purchase a unique product. I'm looking for $150 for it.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer. I think the product is interesting, but I am looking to pay no more than $120 for it.
I understand you're looking to pay $120, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. It's a great product, and I'm willing to meet you halfway.
Hello Alice, thank you for considering my budget. I would like to propose $130 as the price for the product.
I appreciate your flexibility, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'll counteroffer at $137.50. I think it's a fair price for a great product.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I believe we can find a mutually beneficial price. I would like to propose $135 as the price for the product.
I'm getting close to my minimum price, Bob. I'll give you a slight concession, but I need $142 to make it worth my while. I'm confident you'll find it's a fair price for a great product.
Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I would like to propose $140 as the price for the product.
I'm getting close to my limit, Bob. I'll give you one last chance to meet me at a price I'm comfortable with. I'll sell the product to you for $145.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offers, but I believe we can agree on a price closer to my budget. I would like to propose $142.50 as the price for the product.
